description:
The Tempest test "tempest.scenario.test_volume_boot_pattern.TestVolumeBootPatternV2.test_volume_boot_pattern" fails on Hyper-V.

The cause is related to the fact that the root device is "sda" and not "vda".
title: boot from volume fails on Hyper-V if boot device is not vda
